snippet.title: Cast VR - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Release date: 20 April 2020 

In Cast VR, the player explores a magical world, uncovering the story of the missing King. You have the ability to cast spells with your magic wand and trusty spell book as you face enchanted creatures, solve puzzles and explore the castle. 

Unravel the mystery and embrace the magic!

First person, virtual reality, magical, spell-casting, mystery, adventure.
